content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were having coffee on the patio at 6 am. we do that daily and look at the stars/sky and chat before he leaves for work.
i was sitting facing away from the house, and noticed the triangle gliding by above his head and yelled......"look at that, look at that". he immediately looked up and saw it.
i knew that it wasn't anything i'd ever seen before, ergo my yelling for my brother to look at it.
the object was approximately 300 feet out from the side of the house and approximately 100 feet above the treetop.  it glided by quickly and soundlessly from west to east. the shape was a perfect triangle with approximately 6-7 evenly spaced lights on all three sides aiming down (not on the sides of the craft). they were perfectly round and glowed hazy white.  the craft was approximately 90-100 feet long.
at first we were trying to think of anything else it could be, but we both knew what we had seen. there are only about four people i shared this with because they know me well and wouldn't question what i saw.
believe it or not, we were both calm and mesmerized and i had an incredibly peaceful feeling afterward.
unfortunately the craft was in sight 4-5 long seconds.....It was low over the treetops and we lost sight of it. there was no sense trying to run out to the street for a better look because it was moving too fast.
we both know what we saw. i've not been able to find pictures on any site that matches this.  please ......It was not birds or a plane. planes absolutely wouldn't fly that low...And they would have been heard a long way. my eyesight is 20/20 and i can hear well.
to be honest......We're happy with the knowledge that we've observed this object.  most people aren't that fortunate.
of course i didn't have a camera at 6am having coffee on the patio....And even if i did, turning it on and finding the object within a second would have been impossible.  that is my only regret.
content.summary: Perfect triangle w/evenly spaced hazy white lights on all sides (approx. 6-7 per side)

content.detailedDescription: On 9/24/13 and about 9:30 pm, i was driving on highway 101 south, chehalis washington, on a rainy and foggy night when i saw a big circular red orange object flying sideways over a mountain, and bright everything like a sunshine on a summer time for just seconds, i keep driving on the highway and try to see if we can see more but we couldn't because everything turns more dark and the weather gets worse, but barely we saw the red orange clouds covering the big circular bright red orange object.
content.summary: Black, red orange circular shape

content.detailedDescription: On 9/24/13 and about 9:30 pm, i was driving on highway 101 south, chehalis washington, on a rainy and foggy night when i saw a big circular red orange object flying sideways over a mountain, and bright everything like a sunshine on a summer time for just seconds, i keep driving on the highway and try to see if we can see more but we couldn't because everything turns more dark and the weather gets worse, but barely we saw the red orange clouds covering the big circular bright red orange object.
content.summary: Black, red orange circular shape

content.detailedDescription:
At7pm on may 5 2013,me and my friend saw a silver colored object drop from the sky somewhat slowly and turned west toward houston. it was cylinder shaped craft with a polished silver finish. the craft flew west and about 8 -10 minutes later, two fighter jets appeared from the east and were in a south and west search pattern at the same alitude as the ufo was. in another 5 minutes later,two more fighter jets appeared from the northeast at the same alitude as the other jets and these two were in a side by side attack formation and headed due west toward houston. the object simply flew west toward the horizon. when we firt saw the object,we just looked with amazement at it's strange vertical decent! my buddy is a former 
us army special forces and he said that it did'nt look like any millitary aircraft that he had ever seen. the ufo made no noise and left no vapor trail at all.
content.summary: Silver colored cylinder dropped from the sky and flew west toward houston,tx.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw more than one but, they seemed to be the same object and in the same areas. except one that is black and shaped like a large teardrop. the white objects seem to be either, triangular/ v shaped 
or pure bright solid, white circles or ovals above my house . i see them as i am uploading my photos to iphoto on my mac computer. the sky has been very blue and clear. no planes were visible when i took pictures with my nikon digital camera and no sound at all. i live in the country and surrounded by grape vineyards and have open sky. i mostly see objects at night. i was quite surprised when i had captured objects during the daytime. one white object i caught on camera looks irregular in
shape. i never seen anything like it. i know what i caught is not anything like a plane. today is october 3, 2013. i added photos on mufon.

thank you.
content.shape: Boomerang,   Circle,   Oval,   Sphere,   Teardrop,   Triangle
content.summary: White solid triangular/boomerang shape as i took pictures above my house.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: The night of the sighting i was feeling strange it was as if that everything was surreal is the best way i can describe it and i had gone to let my dog out into the garden to do his toilet before locking the house down for the night and i had walked around the back of my house to keep an eye on him when suddenly i saw what looked like a huey helicopter the kind that you tend to see in films about vietnam and with a door gunner except it was transparent as it was bright orange and gave off the bright orange light and looked as if it had no tail and made no sound at all and was hovering at first and then started to fly over head as it did so at one point it was on a level with me where i could see through it and could see what looked like a piolet in a white helmet and a green flying suit like raf piolets wear and in the position that would of been wear a door gunner would of been standing was what looked like another human man but with either a dark navy blue type uniform on or black and it resembled the uniform like what a british police officer would wear but with no helmet or cap and it flew then over head with no sound at all going slowly at first but then picking up speed and going faster than i know that any helicopter could ever fly or any fighter jet as i am ex raf i am fully aware what speeds such aircraft that we have can achieve as it picked up speed and in only a few seconds it flew over several miles away and stopped and began to hover and i think the one entity that was in the door gunner position had seen me as it suddenly changed direction and started to come back towards me but only came back about a quarter of the distance it had flown away from me and then stopped and hovered for a little longer and then headed back to the point it had reached when it had flown away from me the first time and then went at a 90 degree angle too its flight path and shot off at great speed vanishing from my line of sight in only seconds covering many miles far faster than any jet could achieve i only wish i could be lucky and see this or any other ufo again while i have a camera handy though so i could get proof and not just have a simple story and description of the event and what i saw as i would love to see and communicate with any alien or aliens if that is what they are and what i saw all dates and times are only approximate as i did not know who to report it to or if there was anyone to report it to and did not wish to be ridiculed or make people think i was seeing things as i do haver terminal cancer and am aware that some of the drugs i am on can cause halucinations at times but my doctors have assured me that this would not be the case now as i have been taking the drugs i need and use for far too long to have this type of thing happening to me now and if i was going to be halucinating it would of occured at the very start of taking the drugs i need and use to combat the cancer i have and this ufo that i saw had no tail that i could see so had no tail rotor nor did it have any main rotor blades overhead to keep it in the air and made no sound at all when flying and hovering over head at any time and i am used to the sound of helicopters and other engines from normal aircraft and helicopters and often see and hear the local police helicopter flying over head and around the area so i know it was not any kind of helicopter or any other type of conventional aircraft that i am familiar with be it civilian or military and this aircraft had no other lights that other aircraft use for navigation purposes and to show and let other piolets in the area know that the aircraft is about and in what direction it is travelling nor did it have any kind of anti collison light under neath it or any other lights that i could see and the orange light that it was giving off did not seem to have any natural source that i could see or make out such as a bulb or a spot light or search light or any other kinds of lights of any kind internally or externally and it just looked like a ball of orange light that surrounded the whole craft and no engines or any moving parts of any kind could be seen just the crafts shape and one occupant seated in what would be the piolets position as the craft being transparent you could not even see the seat the piolet was sitting in but you could see that the piolet was seated in some kind of seat and the other occupant was just standing in what apperead to be the door gunners position and was not seated at all yet the manouvers that the craft was performing did not seem to affect this occupant that was standing and nothing could be seen that would be holding him in or keeping him held upright such as a safety harness or similar items that would be worn by someone if they were standing in this position to prevent them falling out of the aircraft if the doors were open or that they could hold onto to remain upright if and when the aircraft banked or made any other kind of manouver which would in normal circumstances make it impiossible for a normal person to remain on there feet without holding onto something or having some kind of harness to stop them from falling
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked similar to a helicopter but was transparent and had no tail and was giving off bright orange light like a hazard warning light

I saw more than one but, they seemed to be the same object and in the same areas. except one that is black and shaped like a large teardrop. the white objects seem to be either, triangular/ v shaped 
or pure bright solid, white circles or ovals above my house . i see them as i am uploading my photos to iphoto on my mac computer. the sky has been very blue and clear. no planes were visible when i took pictures with my nikon digital camera and no sound at all. i live in the country and surrounded by grape vineyards and have open sky. i mostly see objects at night. i was quite surprised when i had captured objects during the daytime. one white object i caught on camera looks irregular in

content.detailedDescription: July 4th standing on hill fairly good distance from kelso observed a pink barrel shaped object. faintly pulsing it was stationary. stayed that way for 55sec then darted swiftly to the right s/e to kelso several hundreds yards. object made abrupt turn then came back to the exact original spot. it abruptly disappeared in less time that it takes to take a breath. it closely looked like several objects that had been televised on a ufo tv show. stayed within focal view very fast. too fast. stopped and moved instantly. has witnessed two other incidences.
content.summary: Barrel shaped object observed near kelso wa

content.detailedDescription: This was in san pedro while on a break from work. a cigar shaped aircraft observed crossing thru clouds translucent but with outline the same color as the clouds. hiding in the clouds, peeked out from the clouds. sliced thru the clouds very quickly, pulsating pulling back and forth as if u were riding a horse that wants to move forward as u pull it back. assumed that who ever was driving didn't know how to use it was trying to keep it hidden? it was the size of three goodyear blimps. shaped like a joint. observed object trying to hide in a smaller cloud two other friends observed the object as well, took off straight line path towards the hollywood hills, within like a second. approximate time that it lasted five to 8 min. called 911 to report a "ufo" sighting was told to call the air force. she connected him with the air force the phone starts ringing while its ringing a voice comes on the line and yelled "what is your name? what is your location" freaked out he hung up. right after that about 15min later many little helicopters flooded the air space where the object had been seen. like many wasp, many people witnessed this. one witness died a month later. date is inconclusive.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object spotted over terminal island in long beach

content.detailedDescription: according to the witness, he was sitting in his yard in lone tree, iowa at around 7:30 pm cdt on friday september 27, 2013 when he noticed a white glowing sun-lit object move switly across 50 degrees of sky in about four seconds. he noticed what appeared to be a cloud-like pressure wave in front of the object.
content.summary: Bright white object moved extremely fast from southwest to northeast

content.detailedDescription:
My friend norman went to yellowstone in july. he recently uploaded the images from the trip. in one of the images was this ufo. he didn't notice it at the time or even later when he posted the pictures until i pointed it out.
no ideas to the size or heading of this object. it does not appear in the photos taken before or after this one.
content.summary: Ufo appears in photo taken of "old faithful" at yellowstone

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the freeway 60 towards los angeles and i found a rod (cigar) like light in the sky. i thought it could be cloud at the very beginning but except that, there was no cloud in the sky. after around 10 minutes, the object faded out within 10 seconds.
content.summary: A cigar-like light appeared in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
these were taken september 19th, 2013 here in caribou ns
just outside of pictou, nova scotia, canada - on family property
i have them in named in the order they were taken and timed stamped by my camera.
these are original and untouched photos. there are others before and after, general scenery shots of the area being taken at the time. we did not notice the orb when the pictures were taken. only after, looking at them october 1st, looking through photos, noticed the image on 7014 and then ���discovered��� the second on 7016 and pieced the sequence of events together.
when i saw these the other day, like i said looking through some pictures we took, taking a second look at 7014....What is that. 
the moon's coming up and that isn't ....Mars? ���the thing is way to big.���  ���my camera lens isn���t that powerful!��� ��� blew it up and noticed the reflection of the moon on the left hand side of this perfectly round ball. what?
after a few minutes i check on the remaining photos in sequence, and notice on photo 7016 there it is again, and gone in the next shot 7017 taken a few seconds later. not right after, as we were not taking pictures of this object (had no idea it was on the photo), we were taking pictures of the pink sky in the case of 7016 and 7017. again, if it was something floating in the air like a cloud or a balloon etc., shouldn���t it still be there 24 seconds later? moving!!
picture titles ��� with times as stamped by my canon eos rebel xs camera ��� (in excellent repair)
    caribou ns sept 19th 7:38:58 pm 7011 ��� with moon
    caribou ns sept 19th 7:39:09 pm 7012 ��� with moon
    caribou ns sept 19th 7:39:22 pm 7013 ��� with moon
    caribou ns sept 19th 7:39:33 pm 7014 ��� with moon ��� ���orb��� ��� photographer facing east
    caribou ns sept 19th 7:39:51 pm 7015 ��� moving east to south
    caribou ns sept 19th 7:40:13 pm 7016 ��� pink sky ��� ���orb��� ��� photographer facing south
    caribou ns sept 19th 7:40:37 pm 7017 ��� pink sky

the numbers on the far right (7011 through 7017) are the picture numbers assigned by my camera
the camera also records the time of the pictures, dates, speed, and aperture.
please note - the total time between the first and last picture is 1 minute 35 seconds
between image 7014 and 7016 is only 40 seconds at that altitude, must equate to quite a distance in 40 seconds.
the distance travelled between picture 7014 (facing east) and 7016 (facing south) is quite large in a time of 40 seconds and results in a complete directional change (photographers vantage) from east to south. we had no chance of ���seeing��� this when we took pictures of the ���beautiful moon��� and ���pink sky at night���. this thing was moving too fast obviously. again, we only noticed the (what i now call ���the orb���) round ���spot��� on the first picture 7014 a couple of days ago and started questioning.
have shared this with some family members here, they seem to agree there is something in the photo. of course they know me and it was interesting that my nephew said ���if it was coming from someone he didn���t know, didn���t recognize the property, knew i wouldn���t have any interest in putting themselves ���out there��� he would have dismissed these images. i might possibly have said the same thing.
makes you reflect on the other stories you hear.
the first shot (7011 through 7014) we are looking east.
picture 7015 moving from east to west.
pictures 7016 and 7017 are facing south.
so a fairly large piece of sky for something to move so quickly across.
how many miles at that altitude in 30 seconds!?
these pictures have good enough resolution to blow them up fairly large (you lose focus after a bit) but the shape is round. no matter how big you blow it up, the edges don't distort. it isn't a cloud or a wisp of smoke. the pink picture, 7016 shows the image quite clearly again.
we had no idea these images were on here. doesn't appear to be an "airplane" or "swamp gas" to me.
and the distance it moved it that time....No wonder the naked eye doesn't see this stuff.
this isn't a joke...I have the original photos (date and time stamped) unaltered and no skills, software, time nor interest to play games. 
well.....What do you think?
thank you for taking a look and getting back to me with any feedback you feel relates or explains or supports these images as being������.What???
all the very best.
michael
ps ��� towards some ���vetting��� of myself. i am aware of sightings, not a fanatic, just open minded.
we have had some famous ones here in nova scotia. my friends and some family have reported seeing things ���in the sky��� in the past, they couldn���t figure out. my partner kim and i have recently seen a very bright ���star��� over the complex of wind turbines locally last week. it was that bright we first spotted it from several miles away. just sitting right over the wind farm complex. wasn���t there an hour later when we returned? then, when i came across these a few days ago���.Just kind of "wigged me out" and thought i'd ask the opinions of your organization. actually having something in my hand like this that i know without a doubt is real, has me now totally convinced there is some major stuff going on we���re not being made fully cognizant off. i mean, come on! how can we capture an image like this and the
content.summary: Only noticed images in photos about a month after they were taken in sequence

content.detailedDescription:
Hello

i have taken this picture right above the glacier mer de glace in mont blanc mountains (france) during july 2013. just to clarify, when i took the picture i did not see this object so definitely was moving very fast and also i haven't heard any noise at all. 

also, i was shooting a lot of pictures one after another and checking the pictures taken previous to this one as well as the ones taken after, nothing out of the ordinary was visible. 

i cannot really specify the direction of the object just i can say i was about 100 m from the blue cave within the glacier (is some artificial grotto dug out for tourists) with my back towards the blue cave and i took the picture turned slightly to my left.

i realized what i captured only 1 week later while returning from vacation and checking the pictures.

from my knowledge no stealth planes are in that area or any other military planes as its very close to switzerland and i seriously doubt france would risk.

though i am quite skeptical about this i would appreciate your feedback as i am still not sure what it might be.
content.summary: Strange lights

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i took a walk around my apartment complex to stretch our legs and catch up on the latest news in our personal lives. i've often taken a stroll like this around my complex, and have done so for the past six years, and although i have looked for ufo's many times, i've never seen anything in the sky but planes en route to or from the philadelphia airport. not so tonight! as we approached the back hillside overlooking the neighboring town, i noticed what i thought were airplanes on the horizon, but they didn't act like planes since they weren't moving in a normal flight pattern but instead were hovering in one spot. there were roughly 10-20 of them in a cluster formation, hovering and flashing with blinking red or white lights. i couldn't believe it! i've been wanting to see a ufo for quite sometime and had given up really. i grabbed my friend and said, "pinch me, but i think there are ufo's in the sky tonight." i pointed due east. we agreed that they definitely weren't planes. i guesstimated that they were a hundred or more miles away, probably flying over the jersey shore somewhere, but i'm not a good judge of distance. they faded out of view after ten minutes or so. i'm still in awe of this sighting.
content.summary: A cluster of ships hovering and blinking in the cloudless night sky for 15 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
i have seen many unidentified flying objects over the past year.  this past week, an object has shown up several nights in the western sky and has hovered for quite a while before disappearing.  tonight,i went outside to see if the object had returned.  the weird thing was that as soon as i went out my front door, the object pulled up as if it were a car stopping at a 3-way stop.  i first viewed the object with my weak binoculars and then commenced to take a picture.  i started to take a second picture, but the object vanished!
this amazed me as this object, as well as previous objects, have hovered around for several hours in the past.  during this sighting, a commercial airplane passed by the object; i live near the flight path of lunken airport in cincinnati, ohio.
content.summary: Really strange ufo occurrence in campbell county, ky

content.detailedDescription:
I need your help immediately, please come to my home and see for yourself what's happening. i'll give full detail when we talk.

bring all equipment to take measurement readings, they are off chart level. 

extremely serious i need help immediately please help me soon.
content.summary: Seen alien setting on man shoulder at downtown event and it followed me home

content.detailedDescription:
on oct. 1.2013 i was sitting in my car watching the night sky facing lake superior(north). iwas talking with my girlfriend on the phone when a red light(object)i don't know raced across my line of sight from east to west and crossed the horizon in about the time it takes to say one thousand one. then it was gone.
 the object(light) made no sound, there was no arc to it; it moved horizontally to the horizon.No lights pulsated, there were no running lights like a plane.
if you look on a  map, the distance from ashland to the barksdale area is appox. 1-2 miles across lake superior. this thing covered that distance in about the blink of the eye.
that is about it. i do a lot of night photography and i was in aviation when i was in the military. i 've seen strange things before but nothing this fast.
content.summary: Covered vast distance in very short time span

content.detailedDescription:
Cms test - cross state case entry

texas fi entering a case from california

do not assign
content.summary: Cms test - cross state case entry

content.detailedDescription:
I usually go out for a smoke and i sat in the chair that on the porch, i alway look to the sky. either  at planes or just looking. this early morning as i was looking toward the north i saw this oblong shape hovering in the sky. at first i thought it was a helicopter hovering, but the three light from this object was one above the other. and all lit.
and just below the object it flow one of the l a x planes im sure they saw it.
i set out there for a while and after i smoked the whole cigarette and watch the object not move at all with the air planes flying under them this thing did not move at all.
i brush it off as something the sky and went back in the  house after watch this thing for over a hour. just to see if it will move but it didn't so i just went to bed. 
it was so far away my camera wouldn't pick it up so i didn't even bother taking pictures. 
i like to know if it was any reports of this object from pallet. 
and sorry for the mis-spell words.
content.summary: Cigar shape hovered in sky. over plane route, im sure planes saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
The objects that appeared on my photos came out pretty clear and somewhat close over my house. i did not notice these objects when taking the photos. i happened to notice them while importing them onto my iphoto on my mac laptop. i was shocked when i saw them. the two solid bright white objects i am guessing they were the same object, since they looked the same. the black darker object i have no idea. they were all below cloud level and there were no planes or any aircrafts in the sky. the sky was super clear and blue no clouds. this is my first daytime capture of something like this. i mostly see objects at night that i have captured on my video camcorder with three cassette tapes complete. 
i still have to upload on my computer. the time i took these daytime photos was approx. around or after 4:00pm pacific time. the darker object was shot over my house facing west. one of the white objects was facing south. then the last second shot of the white object was shot looking up over my chimney. i took my photos with a nikon digital. i have three photos.
camera d 50.  thank you.
content.summary: I took photos from my front yard. a bright white object showed up on my photos. also, a dark dull object showed up. they looked round. the sky was very clear & not planes around and was very quiet out.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished dinner and was looking out the window at the blue sky and saw a bright light over the nw part of the city in the downtown area. it was a bright bright light in the shape of a cigar about the size of a medium airplane, with no wings or tail. it was like neon light but brighter. i was going to get my binoculars but i had my glasses on and could see it quite clearly. i was staring at it and it was as if a cloud came in front of it, but no clouds were in the air and it disappeard for a couple of seconds then reappeared in the same position. as i watched, it stayed for maybe another minute and then a turbulence of air seemed to come from the north end of it and it disappeared.
content.summary: Observed stationary bright object that disappeard and then reappeared, ejected a puff and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Early this morning i noticed another ball of red pulsating light ascending over the lake area to the east. i drove my car to the closest point and filmed the object hovering stationary. driving further i saw several of the objects at different locations in the night sky in a one mile area approximately. i gave chase to one of the fast moving objects and after a few miles saw several more over a certain area. i want out onto the golf course where the were hovering, gliding and began filming the objects, there were a handful of them. their was no sound from the objects except when one flew close to directly over head i heard a faint jet like noise however the objects seemed to be moving to slowly to be planes and they would also appear stationary and then began moving and adding blinking lights of different colors. in one video i think i can see a grey hull, the shape of the object can be described as, for lake of a better word, a klingon bird of prey. please see the videos and i do have full high definition quality videos of all my posted videos as well as more shorter clips should you be interested in a better quality video source for examination. these objects are appearing almost every night. the longest video was taken in the presence of 2 other witnesses.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Filmed objects at multiple locations, chased moving objects in car, filmed up close, grey hull

content.detailedDescription: We live in south venice fl. on thursday 26th september 2013 at 8.35pm and also on friday 27th at 8.55pm we saw a strange craft flying in the night sky. my wife and i were sitting out in the lanai by the pool enjoying the lovely evening. the sky was clear with no clouds and no moonlight, except for one or two small planes from time to time and the odd high flying jet you always see. i saw the craft first before my wife, but she saw it too on both nights. a subtle movement in the ne night sky caught my eye, at first i thought it was a flock of geese flying in a v formation. when i looked at it i could see it was a large transparent boomerang v-shaped wing flying high against the starfield, but you could only see the edge of the craft distorting the stars as it moved around. if youve seen the film predator, the craft's structure appeared like it was cloaked just like that. it was huge, the size of my 2 crossed thumbs together held at arms length. on the 1st night the craft was flying level and steady to the south of us moving ne to s across the sky. it was about 1000 ft up or maybe more, so we could clearly see it from the side and underneath as it passed to the sw of us. the craft was silent, and it appeared to be shimmering like water, it seemed like it was surrounded by a luminous fluid or gas, it looked like a force field that was protecting (?) the craft from the air as it flew forwards, the gas flowed over and under the wing like water and it distorted the light of the stars behind it as it flew forwards. we saw it for about 10 seconds before it flew out of sight over the roof of our house. incredibly on the next night we saw the same thing again. it was high up in the sky in the ne but this time it flew towards us at extreme speed (took about 5 secs to travel the distance to us) and then slowed and flew more slowly when directly overhead and then over the house towards the gulf. it looked like the same craft returning as the previous night. as it flew over the lanai/house for about 4 secs it became visible (uncloaked?) and it banked over like a plane would do before it disappeared from view over the house roof. it looked like it was showing off doing an intentional fly-by ! it was huge and so breathtakingly awesome, an absolutely beautiful ship at least a football field or two wide. it was silent (my wife heard a crackling noise like a bug zapper as it passed over), it was shiny dark-gray colored and had a blue/white stripe of light from wingtip to wingtip shaped like a drawn longbow. the shape was like a boomerang with tapered rounded wings and when it became visible more like a manta ray without a tail. the craft's surface was hard to see clearly but was not flat/smooth and it had ridges and convolutions on the wings and wing tip edges which were curved and curled up. it had 2 large circle/sphere shapes under each wing which could have been lights but they were'nt lit. i was reluctant to report this as people will think we're crazy, but we arent. i'm a perfectly sane ex-psychiatric nurse. the dog saw/felt it too and went ape running around the lanai barking at it the 2nd time. i was a sceptic, now i'm most definitely not ! unfortunately we didnt have a camera with us the 2nd time as we thought this was a once in a lifetime thing. i was wrong. i've never witnessed anything like this before and it was definitely not an airplane/lenticular clouds/birds etc !
content.summary: Huge transparent boomerang ufo flew down and over our house becoming solid and clearly visible as it passed overhead

content.detailedDescription: We live in south venice fl. on thursday 26th september 2013 at 8.35pm and also on friday 27th at 8.55pm we saw a strange craft flying in the night sky. on thursday my wife and i were sitting out in the lanai by the pool enjoying the lovely evening. the sky was clear with no clouds and no moonlight, except for one or two small planes from time to time and the odd high flying jet you always see. i saw the craft first before my wife, but she saw it too on both nights. a subtle movement in the ne night sky caught my eye, at first i thought it was a flock of geese flying in a v formation. when i looked at it i could see it was a large transparent boomerang v-shaped wing flying high against the starfield, but you could only see the edge of the craft distorting the stars as it moved around. if youve seen the film predator, the craft's structure appeared like it was cloaked just like that. it was huge, the size of my 2 crossed thumbs together held at arms length. on the 1st night the craft was flying level and steady to the south of us moving ne to s across the sky. it was about 1000 ft up or maybe more, so we could clearly see it from the side and underneath as it passed to the sw of us. the craft was silent, and it appeared to be shimmering like water, it seemed like it was surrounded by a luminous fluid or gas, it looked like a force field that was protecting (?) the craft from the air as it flew forwards, the gas flowed over and under the wing like water and it distorted the light of the stars behind it as it flew forwards. we saw it for about 10 seconds before it flew out of sight over the roof of our house. incredibly on the next night we saw the same thing again. it was high up in the sky in the ne but this time it flew towards us at extreme speed (took about 5 secs to travel the distance to us) and then slowed and flew more slowly when directly overhead and then over the house towards the gulf. it looked like the same craft returning as the previous night. as it flew over the lanai/house for about 4 secs it became visible (uncloaked?) and it banked over like a plane would do before it disappeared from view over the house roof. it looked like it was showing off doing an intentional fly-by ! it was huge and so breathtakingly awesome, an absolutely beautiful ship at least a football field or two wide. it was silent (my wife heard a crackling noise like a bug zapper as it passed over), it was shiny dark-gray colored and had a blue/white stripe of light from wingtip to wingtip shaped like a drawn longbow. the shape was like a boomerang with tapered rounded wings and when it became visible more like a manta ray without a tail. the craft's surface was hard to see clearly but was not flat/smooth and it had ridges and convolutions on the wings and wing tip edges which were curved and curled up. it had 2 large circle/sphere shapes under each wing which could have been lights but they were'nt lit. i am reluctant to report this as people will think we're crazy, but we arent. i'm a perfectly sane ex-psychiatric nurse. the dog saw/felt it too and went ape running around the lanai barking at it the 2nd time. i was a sceptic, now i'm most definitely not ! unfortunately we didnt have a camera with us the 2nd time as we thought this was a once in a lifetime thing. i was wrong. i've never witnessed anything like this before and it was definitely not an airplane/lenticular clouds/birds etc !
content.summary: Luminous transparent boomerang shaped ufo seen twice on consecutive nights by two witnesses, on the 2nd night the craft flew overhead and was seen clearly.

content.detailedDescription: We live in south venice fl. on thursday 26th september 2013 at 8.35pm and also on friday 27th at 8.55pm we saw a strange craft flying in the night sky. on thursday my wife and i were sitting out in the lanai by the pool enjoying the lovely evening. the sky was clear with no clouds and no moonlight, except for one or two small planes from time to time and the odd high flying jet you always see. i saw the craft first before my wife, but she saw it too on both nights. a subtle movement in the ne night sky caught my eye, at first i thought it was a flock of geese for about 10 seconds before it flew out of sight over the roof of our house. incredibly on the next night we saw the same thing again. it was high up in the sky in the ne but this time it flew towards us at extreme speed (took about 5 secs to travel the distance to us) and then slowed and flew more slowly when directly overhead and then over the house towards the gulf. it looked like the same craft returning as the previous night. as it flew over the lanai/house for about 4 secs it became visible (uncloaked?) and it banked over like a plane would do before it disappeared from view over the house was like a boomerang with tapered rounded wings and when it became visible more like a manta ray without a tail. the craft's surface was hard to see clearly but was not flat/smooth and it had ridges and convolutions on the wings and wing tip edges which were curved and curled up. it had 2 large circle/sphere shapes under each wing which could have been lights but they were'nt lit. i am reluctant to report this as people will think we're crazy, but we arent. i'm a perfectly sane ex-psychiatric nurse. the dog saw/felt it too and went ape running around the lanai barking at it the 2nd time. i was a sceptic, now i'm most definitely not ! unfortunately we didnt have a camera with us the 2nd time as we thought this was a once in a lifetime thing. i was wrong. i've never witnessed anything like this before and it was definitely not an airplane/lenticular clouds/birds etc !

content.detailedDescription: This is the second time we've seen this craft. only this time it was heading south and was blacker than the sky above it. it came later than the first siting monday at 8:43. i'm in golden colorado. whatever this thing is my house is on its flight path. it's like the thing they saw in ellis county texas. black boomerang craft that's blacker than the sky when your under it and it had a mist or cloud around it looking from the side or behind.  it was flying fast with no sound. my roommate witnessed it this time with my friend and i.  whatever it is it's trying to hide from us. kinda creepy now.  i'm betting it's gonna be back again tonight i suspect. to bad i don't have a thermal camera to set up.  it's incredible!
content.summary: After see the boomerang ship fly over us monday night we went back out looking for it again tuesday night. it flew back over us at 8:43pm going south. we got another witness!

content.detailedDescription: Was standing on my step at work, 2501 wharton st philadelphia pa 19145, having a smoke and a glint caught my attention. it looked like a bunch of silver mylar balloons, but way high in the eastern sky. turned around looked up the street finished my cigarette, about a min or so and it was still there, but now was rotating? because the sun was shining off the silver. i come in get my employees they look at it and it's starts to reflect again and more, but still the same height and direction, about twice as high as the news copters fly if not more, got my tellephoto on my camera to see if i could see it better but still looked blurry, came in, tried to call my wife and as i'm calling and looking at it and blip  it was gone, no streak no movement like a light switch gone. basic facts, it was silver and reflective, and kept stationary for 7 or 8 mins and disappeared, it was too high and far to give accurate info on shape or extrapolate size. i hope someone else saw it. i am  firm believer in aliens, but being prior military i am skeptical. either way it was an object that i couldn't identify acting strangely for our area.
content.summary: Virticle,  with round facets? like rain drops, reflective silver, exactly like a large bunch of balloons but perfectly stationary in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I have a trail cam that takes pictures of any motion.  when i checked my computer this picture was taken by the camera. the object appears to be hovering above the ground based on the shadow.The white block in the background sitting on a stump is a salt block for the deer to lick. i then went to the area of the picture and looked for evidence.  i didn't see any markings or anything that would explain the object to be anything other than a ufo.  i would appreciate some feedback and thoughts pertaining to this photograph.
content.summary: Trail cam took picture of bright blue object hovering above the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
About 37 years ago i was in my mothers home and falling asleep for the night. a very loud noise woke me from outside, like a rumbling or a huge engine. my mother said it sounded like a squadron of planes. when i looked up at the sky from my window, i saw very close by, hovering over the trees, a fairly large boxy thing with glowing orange orbs encircling the part that stuck up in the middle of it. it's angular  outline reminded  me of an old taxi but much sharper and more angular.
no light or beam emitted from the orbs but they glowed brightly. 
this object came sharply forward towards us then suddenly was going another direction. the noise cut off as though a switch was thrown and then just as suddenly, it was completely gone.
i was terrified.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Boxy shape with glowing orbs hovered then came forward, changing suddenly to sharp left and rising until gone almost instantly. it made a loud noise then the noise suddenly stopped as if by switch. the orbs glowed but sent out no light. it had square
